title: lmvegas
author: lmvegas
content: As the title states, we are looking for experienced marketers in the casino domain. Salary will be discussed based on previous experience, references and/or performance. comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: From my experience, I can see two options for you to market your casino if related to crypto even though you don't need to hire marketers. First is preferable Bitcointalk signature campaign which has preferred by other users as well. Another is to use banner ads on crypto-oriented sites. You may use Coinzila for that, they established a great advertising network. I have seen a couple of reputed casinos running ads through Coinzila. Both of them would use by you or you may hire a signature campaign manager from the forum.
